product_name: Patagonia Capilene 4 Expedition Weight Quarter-Zip Hoodie - Women's
long_description: A breathable base layer to keep you warm when it's really cold, the Capilene 4 Expedition Weight women's long underwear quarter-zip hoodie offers a cozy feel with a soft hood and a zippered neck. Open-grid brushed fleece interior warms your core, wicks moisture and rests smoothly against your skin. Polygiene(R) permanent odor control resists odors. Front zipper ventilates when you overheat and tall collar covers neck to block out chilly air. Details include articulated, offset-seamed sleeves for complete shoulder mobility, hidden thumb loops to ensure wrist coverage and an elongated zipper for efficient venting. Long enough to tuck into pants, the women's Patagonia Capilene 4 Expedition Weight long underwear quarter-zip hoodie has a droptail hem that stays put under a harness.
short_description: A breathable base layer to keep you warm when it's really cold, the Capilene 4 Expedition Weight women's long underwear quarter-zip hoodie offers a cozy feel with a soft hood and a zippered neck.
